00020 bool DefaultRules::ValidPlaceTile(Field *field, Player *player, BlokusTile *tile, u8 x, u8 y)
00021 {
00022       if(tile->getAmount() == 0)
00023             return false;
00024 
00025       // Check corners at start
00026       if(!player->PlacedFirstTile())
00027       {
00028             if(x == 0)
00029             {
00030                   if(y == 0)
00031                   {
00032                         if(field->Blocks[0] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00033                               return false;
00034                         if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[0] == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00035                               return false;
00036                         return true;
00037                   }
00038                   else if (y == field->Height - tile->getTileData()->Height)
00039                   {
00040                         if(field->Blocks[(field->Height-1)*field->Width] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00041                               return false;
00042                         if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[(tile->getTileData()->Height-1)*tile->getTileData()->Width] == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00043                               return false;
00044                         return true;
00045                   }
00046                   return false;
00047             }
00048             else if (x == field->Width - tile->getTileData()->Width)
00049             {
00050                   if(y == 0)
00051                   {
00052                         if(field->Blocks[field->Width-1] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00053                               return false;
00054                         if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[tile->getTileData()->Width-1] == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00055                               return false;
00056                         return true;
00057                   }
00058                   else if (y == field->Height - tile->getTileData()->Height)
00059                   {
00060                         if(field->Blocks[(field->Height-1)*field->Width+field->Width-1] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00061                               return false;
00062                         return true;
00063                   }
00064                   return false;
00065             }
00066             return false;
00067       }
00068 
00069       // Check for overlapping
00070       for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00071       {
00072             for(u8 j = 0; j < tile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00073             {
00074                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*tile->getTileData()->Width + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY
00075                   && field->Blocks[(j+y)*field->Width + x + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00076                         return false;
00077             }
00078       }
00079 
00080       // Check team color
00081 
00082       Block b = player->getTeam();
00083 
00084 /*    // Check left edge.
00085 
00086       if(x != 0)
00087       {
00088             for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Height; ++i)
00089             {
00090                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[i*tile->getTileData()->Width] != BLOCK_EMPTY
00091                   && field->Blocks[(y+i)*field->Width + x - 1] == b)
00092                         return false;
00093             }
00094       }
00095 
00096       // Check right edge.
00097 
00098       if(x != field->Width - tile->getTileData()->Width)
00099       {
00100             for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Height; ++i)
00101             {
00102                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[(i+1)*tile->getTileData()->Width - 1] != BLOCK_EMPTY
00103                   && field->Blocks[(y+i)*field->Width + tile->getTileData()->Width + x] == b)
00104                         return false;
00105             }
00106       }
00107 
00108       // Check top edge.
00109 
00110       if(y != 0)
00111       {
00112             for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00113             {
00114                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[i] != BLOCK_EMPTY
00115                   && field->Blocks[(y-1)*field->Width + (x+i)] == b)
00116                         return false;
00117             }
00118       }
00119 
00120       // Check bottom edge.
00121 
00122       if(y != field->Height - tile->getTileData()->Height)
00123       {
00124             for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00125             {
00126                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[(tile->getTileData()->Height-1)*tile->getTileData()->Width + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY
00127                   && field->Blocks[(y+tile->getTileData()->Height)*field->Width + (x+i)] == b)
00128                         return false;
00129             }
00130       }*/
00131 
00132       // Check for adjacent tiles of same color
00133 
00134       for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00135       {
00136             for(u8 j = 0; j < tile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00137             {
00138                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*tile->getTileData()->Width + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00139                   {
00140                         // Check left edge.
00141 
00142                         if((x+i) != 0 && field->Blocks[(y+j)*field->Width + (x+i-1)] == b)
00143                               return false;
00144 
00145                         // Check right side.
00146 
00147                         if((x+i) != field->Width -1 && field->Blocks[(y+j)*field->Width + (x+i+1)] == b)
00148                               return false;
00149 
00150                         // Check above block.
00151 
00152                         if((y+j) != 0 && field->Blocks[(y+j-1)*field->Width + (x+i)] == b)
00153                               return false;
00154 
00155                         // Check below block.
00156 
00157                         if((y+j) != field->Height -1 && field->Blocks[(y+j+1)*field->Width + (x+i)] == b)
00158                               return false;
00159                   }
00160             }
00161       }
00162 
00163       // Check for diagonal tiles of same color
00164 
00165 /*    if(x != 0 && y != 0)
00166       {
00167             if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[0] != BLOCK_EMPTY && field->Blocks[(y-1)*field->Width + (x-1)] == b)
00168                   return true;
00169       }*/
00170 
00171       for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00172       {
00173             for(u8 j = 0; j < tile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00174             {
00175                   if(tile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*tile->getTileData()->Width + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00176                   {
00177 
00178                         // Check tile corners
00179 
00180                         if((x+i) != 0 && (y+j) != 0 && field->Blocks[(y-1+j)*field->Width + (x+i-1)] == b)
00181                               return true;
00182 
00183                         if((x+i) != 0 && (y+j) != field->Height - 1 && field->Blocks[(y+j+1)*field->Width + (x+i-1)] == b)
00184                               return true;
00185 
00186                         if((x+i) != field->Width -1 && (y+j) != 0 && field->Blocks[(y+j-1)*field->Width + (x+i+1)] == b)
00187                               return true;
00188 
00189                         if((x+i) != field->Width -1 && (y+j) != field->Height -1 && field->Blocks[(y+j+1)*field->Width + (x+i+1)] == b)
00190                               return true;
00191                   }
00192             }
00193       }
00194 
00195       return false;
00196 }

00198 void DefaultRules::PlacedTile(Field *field, Player *player, BlokusTile *tile, u8 x, u8 y)
00199 {
00200       tile->setAmount(tile->getAmount() - 1);
00201       player->UsedTile();
00202 }

00204 Player *DefaultRules::CreatePlayers()
00205 {
00206       Player *players = new Player[PlayerCount];
00207 
00208       for(u8 i = 0; i < PlayerCount; ++i)
00209       {
00210             players[i].setTeam(i+1);
00211 
00212             FillStandardTileSet(players[i].getTileSet());
00213       }
00214 
00215       return players;
00216 }
